Member Function Documentation

virtual void DataspaceUnit::convertToNeutral ( long  inputNumArgs,
t_atom *  inputAtoms,
long *  outputNumArgs,
double *  output 
) [pure virtual]

Converts from an actual unit to a 'neutral' unit that can be interpreted by other units within this dataspace. This must be defined by a sub-class.

Implemented in CelsiusUnit, FahrenheitUnit, and KelvinUnit.

virtual void DataspaceUnit::convertFromNeutral ( long  inputNumArgs,
double *  input,
long *  outputNumArgs,
t_atom **  outputAtoms 
) [pure virtual]

Converts from a neutral unit back to an actual unit. This must be defined by a sub-class.

Implemented in CelsiusUnit, FahrenheitUnit, and KelvinUnit.
